content: I don't give myself any concrete objective, neither in chess nor in life. Because if I set myself towards it and I reached it, what kind of stimulus would I have then?
translations: ita:Non mi pongo obiettivi precisi, né negli scacchi né nella vita. Perché se lo facessi e raggiungessi quell'obiettivo, che
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by DJ_Saidez (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
